title: BUG: Left Click Doesn't Work on MiniMap
body:
Hey guys I need some help, 

I can't seem to be able to left click and drag on the minimap, I can't even shift and left click the minimap either. 
I have tried logging into different computers but it seems to be only my account, my friend's accounts are able to click on the minimap. 

I have tried resetting the settings to default - does not work. 
I have tried deleting the InputSets.json and PersistedSettings.json - does not work. 
I have tried reinstalling the client - does not work. 
I have tried restarting the client - does not work. 
The game is not in windows mode; full screen - does not work. 

Not sure what to do, please help :<

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you follow these steps to reset your settings, nowadays they're saved to the server so sometimes it can be a bit screwy to reset them completely.

* Login to the client (which syncs your settings with the server)
* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
* Delete the "Persisted.json", "game.cfg" &"input.ini" files
* Launch a custom game
* Exit the custom game
* Exit the client

Let me know if that helps.
